languages.text: Машина функционирует, но сильно изменена: вы видите лишние детали и грубо приваренные модули, местами из щелей сочится смердящее масло, а приборная панель покрыта символами Хаоса. Нет сомнений, что все эти манипуляции были призваны изменить назначение устройства.

The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.
languages.original_text: Машина функционирует, но сильно изменена: вы видите лишние детали и грубо приваренные модули, местами из щелей сочится смердящее масло, а приборная панель покрыта символами Хаоса. Нет сомнений, что все эти манипуляции были призваны изменить назначение устройства.

traits.locale_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

languages.text: La máquina es funcional, pero muy modificada: ves piezas redundantes y módulos con soldaduras toscas, un aceite apestoso rezuma de sus juntas y el cuadro de instrumentos está cubierto de runas del Caos. Es evidente que todas estas manipulaciones pretenden cambiar el propósito del dispositivo.
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

traits.locale_text: La máquina es funcional, pero muy modificada: ves piezas redundantes y módulos con soldaduras toscas, un aceite apestoso rezuma de sus juntas y el cuadro de instrumentos está cubierto de runas del Caos. Es evidente que todas estas manipulaciones pretenden cambiar el propósito del dispositivo.

languages.text: 这台机器依然在工作，但遭到了严重的篡改。你看到它的外壳上连着各种各样的多余部件与粗糙焊接上去的模块，连接处渗出了恶臭的油污，仪表板上涂满了混沌的符号。毫无疑问，这一切操作都是为了篡改这台设备的使用目的。
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

traits.locale_text: 这台机器依然在工作，但遭到了严重的篡改。你看到它的外壳上连着各种各样的多余部件与粗糙焊接上去的模块，连接处渗出了恶臭的油污，仪表板上涂满了混沌的符号。毫无疑问，这一切操作都是为了篡改这台设备的使用目的。

languages.text: その機械は機能しているがかなり改造されている：無駄なパーツや荒く接合されたモジュール、割れ目からは鼻をつくようなオイル臭が漂い、計器盤は混沌のシンボルで埋め尽くされている。これらの全ての操作が行われた意図は、装置の目的を変ることに違いない。
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

traits.locale_text: その機械は機能しているがかなり改造されている：無駄なパーツや荒く接合されたモジュール、割れ目からは鼻をつくようなオイル臭が漂い、計器盤は混沌のシンボルで埋め尽くされている。これらの全ての操作が行われた意図は、装置の目的を変ることに違いない。

languages.text: La machine est fonctionnelle, mais fortement altérée. Vous apercevez des composants superflus et des modules grossièrement soudés, une huile nauséabonde suinte des fissures et le panneau de contrôle est couvert de symboles du Chaos. Il ne fait aucun doute que toutes ces manipulations avaient pour but de modifier la finalité de l'appareil.
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

traits.locale_text: La machine est fonctionnelle, mais fortement altérée. Vous apercevez des composants superflus et des modules grossièrement soudés, une huile nauséabonde suinte des fissures et le panneau de contrôle est couvert de symboles du Chaos. Il ne fait aucun doute que toutes ces manipulations avaient pour but de modifier la finalité de l'appareil.

languages.text: Die Maschine funktioniert, wurde aber stark verändert: Du siehst überflüssige Teile und amateurhaft geschweißte Module, aus den Rissen quillt stinkendes Öl, und die Steuerkonsole ist bedeckt mit Symbolen des Chaos. All diese Veränderungen dienten offensichtlich dazu, die Funktion des Geräts zu verändern.
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.

traits.locale_text: Die Maschine funktioniert, wurde aber stark verändert: Du siehst überflüssige Teile und amateurhaft geschweißte Module, aus den Rissen quillt stinkendes Öl, und die Steuerkonsole ist bedeckt mit Symbolen des Chaos. All diese Veränderungen dienten offensichtlich dazu, die Funktion des Geräts zu verändern.

languages.text: Makine çalışır durumda olsa da büyük ölçüde değiştirilmiş. Lüzumsuz parçalar ve kabaca kaynaklanmış modüller görüyorsun. Çatlardan kokuşmuş yağ sızıyor ve gösterge paneli de Kaos'un sembolleriyle kaplanmış. Bütün bu modifikasyonların cihazın amacını değiştirmek için yapıldığına şüphe yok.
languages.original_text: The machine is functional, but heavily altered: you see redundant parts and crudely welded modules, stinking oil oozes from the cracks, and the dashboard is covered with symbols of Chaos. There is no doubt that all these manipulations were intended to change the purpose of the device.
